name: dev-dependency-pack
author: dr-js
description: W Â· E Â· B = Webpack + ESLint + Babel

scripts.pack: npm run build && npm run pack-check-outdated && npm run pack-all
scripts.pack-all: npm run pack-clear && npm run pack-dev-dep-babel && npm run pack-dev-dep-babel-react && npm run pack-dev-dep-web && npm run pack-dev-dep-web-react && npm run pack-dev-dep-web-react-postcss
scripts.build: npm run build-clear && npm run build-library
scripts.build-library: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=library babel source --out-dir library
scripts.build-library-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=library-dev babel source --out-dir library --watch
scripts.publish: echo "Error: should not publish this package" && exit 1
